title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Outer Space. A ship descends and then turns towards Earth, headed for the western U.S. As it enters the atmosphere it begins to burn. It slows down and hovers over a road, then lands gently. A door opens like a camera lens, and an alien drops down. As soom as he moves, a tire crushes him. Judging by the size of the tire, the alien was 18 to 24 inches tall. The tire is that of the South Park Elementary school bus, which stops to let the boys off. Then it pulls away.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I wonder why Cartman wasn't in school today.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: He probably just ditched to avoid that spelling test.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey guys. How's it going?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Uh, nice costume, dude. Who are you supposed to be? Luke Perry?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Cartman, how come you weren't in school today?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Did you eat too many pork rinds last night?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You guys, you're so funny. No matter how I'm feeling, I can always count on you guys to lighten me up.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I had to stay home because my mother wasn't feeling well. She has the flu, and I wanted to take care of the house so she could stay in bed.  I just wanted to catch you guys to see if we were assigned any homework tonight.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What the hell are you talking about, Cartman?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stop screwing around, dude. We're all gonna go meet at the store later to buy pumpkins to carve.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oooh, then we can enter the carving contest! I'll run home and get money from Mother. Do you guys need some, too?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, this is creepy.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stan reaches his house and enters

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stanley? Look who's here. Aunt Flo.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hello, Stanley. Remember me?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hi, Aunt Flo.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Now, Stanley! Aunt Flo only visits once a month. Be nice.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, Stanley. I brought you and Shelley presents.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Wow, really?! Hey, I love Aunt Flo!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Okay, Shelley. This one's for you. It's a television/CD player/surround sound home theater.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Wow!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What do you say, Shelley?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Thank you, Aunt Flo.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Okay, Stanley. Your turn.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Your very own fish.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What do you say, Stanley?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I don't know.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I think he likes you.  Come on Shelley. Let's hook up your home theater.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Okay.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: How do you like your fish, Stanley?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I don't like it. It's spooky.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, now, what's spooky about a cute, little goldfish? Go put him in your room.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Do I have to?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yes, you do!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Damn it!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Language!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: A DIFFERENT BARBRA PICTURE ZOOMS OUT FROM THE CENTER OF THE SCREEN. NEXT the bus stop. Kyle is already there

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Where have you been, dude?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, my mom's having her monthly visitor.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aunt Flo?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah. Every time she shows up my mom turns into a total bitch.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Where is Cartman? He said he was gonna bring money for us to buy a pumpkin.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah, I wonder why he's being so nice.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Here he comes.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, Cartman! Did you bring us money from your mom?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Heh! Yeah, right! You guys could kiss my black ass!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You said you could get us money, Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Man, you guys are hella stupid! If I had money, I wouldn't give it to you assholes!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, at least he's back to normal.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah, but we can't get a pumpkin, so we can't enter the carving contest!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's okay. Kenny said he'd get one.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, how's Kenny gonna get one?! He's hella poor!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why do you keep saying "hella," fatass?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: 'Cause I'm hella cool, that's why.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: That's not cool!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You guys are just hella jealous.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Night time, storm. Stan's house. Randy is about to turn off the light in Stan's room

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Good night, Stanley. We'll uh see you in the morning.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Can you leave the light on, Dad?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, it has to be off, or your Aunt Flo will complain about wasting electricity.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I wish Aunt Flo didn't have to visit now.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah, me too. But she only visits your mom for five days or so. I'll be out sleeping on the couch.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: In the darkness, Stan pulls the covers close and looks at the fish. They stare at each other, and the fish blows a bubble. Stan turns away, then looks back. The fish just looks at him. Stan then turns towards the window and begins to fall asleep, until lightning startles him upright. He looks at the tank. The fish is gone!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Where did it go?  Huhhh.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Kenny's house. Rain is dripping in all over the ceiling as pails collect the water. Kenny, Kevin and Mom share a blanket on the sofa while Stuart sits in the armchair

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: (Give me that-!)

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Kenny ,

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: (Ow, mom!)

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You share that blanket with your brother!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Who the hell could that be?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hi there, folks! This is a heck of a storm out now! Thought maybe you could use some provisions.  There's some candles and food in there. It ain't much, but it should get you through the night. Take care, folks. I've got other houses to get to.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Kenny, wasn't that your fat, racist, foul-mouthed friend, Eric Cartman?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: (Uh huh)

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stan's house. He gets up once again to look at the tank, but the shirt is not on it anymore.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey. Where did the shirt go?  I covered you with a shirt! Where did it go?! AAAaAaAaAa  I'm not gonna look.  It's not closer. I'm just seeing things. GAAAH!  AAAAAAAH!!  MOM! Mom!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stanley, settle down!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Look. He's gonna kill me, Mom!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Is there a problem?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Uhno problem, Aunto Flo.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Do you not like your goldfish?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I'm sorry. I'm a bad aunt.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: There, there, Aunt Flo. Stanley loves his goldfish.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: 1 25 a.m. Stan is under the covers looking at the spooky fish. After a long while, the fish turns around and starts writing something on the tank wall with his tail. Stan gets out of bed for a closer look. The fish finishes writing and turns to blow on the wall. A gray area appears and the word "KILL" appears within it.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: AAAAAAAAH!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stanley, what are you doing?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: The fish!  But-.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stanley, I'm in no mood for this! Not when youur Aunt Flo is in town! Oh, look, you woke your sister up.  Go to sleep, Stanley!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stan gets back into bed and pulls the covers up. Another flash of lighting gets Stan to sit up again. He looks at the tank again, then gets out of bed for a closer look, failing to notice the growing pool of blood next ot him. The fish again looks down and to the right, and Stan's eyes follow

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: WAAAAAAAH! Mooomm!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: All right, Stanley. I have had enough o-  Oh, Stanley, what have you done, baby? What have you done??

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Mom, I was just sleeping. And the next thing I knew-.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sshhh. It's okay, honey. It's okay. I've got such a good boy, Mommy's little angel.  Now, don't worry, Stanley. Mommy's going to hide the body.  Nobody's going to take my baby away. I've got such a handsome boy, such a good boy.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You're not gonna get away with this!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stan walks over to the window and sees his mom digging a grave next to the body. She then places the body in the grave and covers it up. She returns with the shovel to the kitchen and closes the door behind her.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sharon!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: D'uh! Aunt Flo, what are you doing up?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Look at you, with your little shovel. Just like when you were twelve.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Mom, what are you doing?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sshh. It's going to be okay, Stanley.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Mom, do you think I killed that guy? It was the fish! He says I'm next!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Now get some sleep, baby. Mommy's taken care of everything.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: But MOM!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sshh.

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: Hush little baby, don't say a word. Momma's gonna buy you a mockin'
text: bird

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: If that mockin' bird don't sing, Momma's gonna bury it in the
text: backyard

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: 8 a.m., next day. A rooster crows and Stan's clock farts. Stan wakes up and looks at the tank. The fish is still there. Stan hops off the bed and walks to the tank, but is stopped by another body.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: MMOOMM!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What is it, honey?  My baby's killed again!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No, mom!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What are we gonna do, baby? What are we gonna do??  I've got such a handsome boy, such a good boy.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Almost 8 p.m., Kyle's house. Kyle and Cartman are at table when Kenny comes in

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's about time, Kenny! Did you bring the pumpkin?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: (Uh huh!)

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, where is it?  What the hell is that?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: (It's the only thing I could afford.)

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's all you could afford?! Whoever heard of a squah-o-lantern, Kenny?! That's hella stupid!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stop saying "hella," Cartman!  How are we gonna win the contest with a squash? Whoa, Stan. You don't look so good.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I haven't been sleeping so well.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: God, I hate you, Kenny.  I have to get another knife; this one's hella dull!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: God, will you shut up?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Kyle, you know how some people are, like, murderers and stuff?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Do you think animals can be murderers, too?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I don't know.  Oh, great. He's got that stupid beard on again.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No, Kenny. You should cut with the blade facing away from you. You're gonna hurt yourself. Seriously, dude. Isn't this fun, you guys? Carving pumpkins for Halloween?

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: You guys are my best friends

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: Through thick and thin, we've always been together

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: We're four of a kind, havin' fun all day

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: Just best friends, best friends are we.

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: I love you guys. [throughout the song, Kyle and Stan look on
text: with awe]

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Next day. Stan, Kyle and Kenny are at the bus stop. A picture of Barbra in curls is now on all four corners.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You seem tired, Stan.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I haven't been sleeping well.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: My pet goldfish killed another random person last night.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hoh, that sucks, dude.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, dudes. Man, it's hella cold out here.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Cartman?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Who'd you expect? Maury Povich? Golly, you're hella lame!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What are you doing?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What do you mean, what am I doing?! I''m just standing here. Jesus, mellow out, you guys.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You can't be standing there, Cartman.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why the hell not?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Because you're standing over there!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aaah! Son of a bitch!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Wow, you don't see this every day.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I can't believe what I'm seeing.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's like I'm looking in a mirror.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, this is hella weird.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sunrise, Stan's house. Officer Barbrady approaches the front door, humming. He rings the bell

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh. Uh-Officer Babrady, Woowhat what a surprise. Wwhat can I do for you?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, there's been a report of a few missing people.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Is that so?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah. No biggie, but I was wondering if you had seen any of them.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I'd never seen any of those men, Officer Barbrady.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No, I didn't think so. Mind if I look around the back yard, though?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why would you wanna do that?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, I'm checking everyone's back yards. Missing people usually turn up hiding in someone's bushes. May I?  Well, this all looks in-  oh? Tennis anyone?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: the fourth image of Barbra zooms out and back, and Sharon is now in the basement

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Nobody's going to take my baby away from me! Nobody!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Okay, Mrs. Marsh, I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask you a few qustions.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: South Park Elementary, lunch time. The boys are in the kitchen for their food

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hello there, children!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, Chef.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: All ready for our Halloween lunch? Today I've got spooooooky spaghetti, with freeeeeaky French fries.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Uh, Chef?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Or haaauuunted hash browns.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Chef.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: And a creeeeeepy cookie, and moooooonstrous milk!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Chef.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: And a teeeeerrifying napkin!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Chef!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: We have problems!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, what's the first problem?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Chef, I have a goldfish that keeps killing people.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh. Well, uh, don't worry, Stan. I'm sure it'll work out. Now, what's the other problem?  Oh, nohoho.  Oh, DEAR GOD, NO!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: cafeteria dining area. The five boys and Chef are sitting at a table

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: and them I saw them all at the bus stop, and this son of a bitch is standing there!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I'm sorry I caused so much trouble. This is all very strange to me, too.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Exactly what do you remember?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, I was just standing around, and Stan and Kyle were being really mean, as usual, and Kenny had just bought a new car.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Of course! That's it!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Don't you see, children? This Cartman is from an evil, parallel universe where everything exists as its opposite!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: He's my evil twin? But he doesn't even look that much like me; he's all fat and stuff. He's hella lying.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Will you stop saying that word?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Of course! My pet goldfish must be from the evil, opposite universe, too!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Children, somewhere in South Park, something has created a door to the evil, parallel universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: This is amazing! I can't believe how nice you are, Chef.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: How do you mean?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: In my world, you're a skinny, white insurance salesman.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stan's house, daytime. The boys enter the living room and Stan places his fish on a small desk next to the sofa. Aunt Flo greets them.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Ooh, hello, boys. I'm Stan's Aunt Flo.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Whoa! What's wrong with your head?! Why are you shaking like that?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, that's not cool. She's got Parkinson's disease.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Ey, sweet!  Sweeeeeet! Check it out, guys: you don't even have to put a quarter in her.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, this is hella cool.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aunt Flo, where did you get this goldfish?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Nn-oh.  I got it from the pet store, Stanley.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Do you remember what pet store?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Let's see. I believe it was called "The Indian Burial Ground Pet Store," just outside of town.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Where?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I know I have the address written down somewhere.  Let me look.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: That's it, dude. We've gotta take the spooky fish back to that pet store.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Who's "we"? You got a turd in your pocket? I'm goin' home. I'm hella hungry!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I'll help you, Stan.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Shut your god-damned mouth, fatass!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude. Are you sure that fish is a murderer? It seemed like a normal fish to me.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Just help me take it back. Come on! Did you find the address, Aunt Flo- Aunt Flo!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, Stanley, no! Not Aunt Flo!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It was the fish!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, what a good baby. What a good son I have.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Now we'll never know where that pet store is!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: There can't be that many pet stores in South Park, dude.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aunt Flo isn't from South Park. The pet store could be anywhere between here and Denver.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, we'd better get working. Cartman, you go home and call all the pet stores in the phone book.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Can do!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Screw you!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's all taken care of, Stanley- G'oh! I've got such a good boy, such a handsom boy!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Come on, we're running out of time.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, why is the basement door locked?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: the Marsh basement. Barbrady is still tied up

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: -crack corn and I don't care

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: Jimmy crack corn and I don't care

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: long pause

title: SPOOKY FISH
role: Jimmy crack corn and I don't care

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Cartman's house. Both Cartmans are seated on the sofa. Evil Cartman has the phone book, Cartman has a pot pie

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I don't see any pet stores called "Indian Burial Ground."

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Shut up, dude! I'm trying to watch TV!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: And now, back to the Terrance and Phillip Halloween Special.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: (Fart)

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: That fart was absolutely ghoulish, Terrance.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Uh-ho-ho, man, that's hella funny!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What's so funny about that?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Meow.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No, Kitty, this is my pot pie!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Meow.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No, Kitty, this is my pot pie, Kitty!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Who's my kitty? Who's my little kitty? My fluffy little cat. Yeah, that's good, yeah, that's my nice little kitty, yeah.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: NO KITTY, BAD KITTY!!  Hahaha, you-hoo suck, dude.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Night time, the Marsh house. Stan and Kyle are on the sofa. Sharon enters with another woman

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stanley. Kenny's mother is here. She's wondering if you've seen Kenny.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You saw him, didn't you?  You saw my boy.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah, my goldfish-.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah. Stan just got a new goldfish and he wanted to show it to Kenny but, Kenny never came over.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: My Kenny used to laugh and play. He was eight years old, just like you, my Kenny was.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I know.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You've gotta tell me what happened to him!  You have to know somthing!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Mrs. McCormick, I'm going to have to ask you to leave! You've been drinking!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: That's right, I'm a little drunk.  You'd be drunk, too, if you'd lost your boy. My Kenny used to sing and dance, eh.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You guys, I found the pet store!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Come on, let's go!  Mom, I know you think I did all this, but I'm gonna prove to you it was this fucking fish!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I believe you, sweetheart.  Run from him, boys. Run and don't stop!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: A stormy night, at the pet store. The remains of a covered wagon are next to it. The three boys enter

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Can I help you boys?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I wanna return a fish.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Damn it!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: That's the ninth return I've had this week! What's wrong with it?  Ap! Let me guess. It killed a bunch of people, right?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah, dude.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Damn it!  Just like all the other returns!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, why is your store called "The Indian Burial Ground Pet Store?"

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, there was an Indian burial ground here before I bought it.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: So you just- built your store on top of an Indian burial ground?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, hell no! First I dug up all the bodies, pissed on 'em, then buried them again upside down.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why? I don't know. I was drunk.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: We think that when you did that, you opened up a doorway to an evil, parallel universe.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, that certainly would explain a lot.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Like what?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, like this.  I've been wondering what the hell this was.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stan's house. Randy finally opened the door to the basement and brings down some items.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hello, Mr. Marsh. Top of the evening to you.  Okay, bye, then.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: The kitchen. Sharon is preparing cookie dough. Randy enters.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sharon?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yyes, hon?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: There's a policeman being held captive in our basement.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yes, hon. I had to restrain him so he wouldn't find the bodies in the back yard and take our baby away.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why'd you take his pants off?  Sh-sharon, why'd you take his- pants off?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, Randy, I just don't know what to do anymore.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What is it?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I just ughhhh, I can't believe that Aunt Flo is gone, that she won't be visiting me ever again.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh. Wuwell, don't- think of it as an end, think of it as a new beginning. Now, could you fill me in on the dead bodies and captive policeman stuff real quick?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Back at the pet store

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Look, pal. This is very simple. All I want to do is return this fish.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I can't give you your money back.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I don't care, dude! I just want this fish away from me!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No! I won't take it back!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Listen, friend. You can't sell people pets like this. You have to have a sign that says, "Warning: these fish are from an evil, parallel universe." Now, it's not our fault you disrespected the bodies of this land's native people, but by golly , you're gonna take this fish back.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: All right, you win.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Wow! Thanks, evil Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: And sir, can I make a suggestion? Move your store, and let these great people of the Wampanoag rest in peace.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You kick ass, evil Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You know what I like best about you? You don't say, "hella," like our Cartman does. I swear, if he says that one more time, I'm gonna kill him!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No, Kyle. Murder is never an answer.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What the-?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: He was here! Cartman was just here!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Who are you?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: We're looking for Cartman. The trail ended here. Where is he?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I don't know who you mean?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Maybe this will jog your memory!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No! Stop! You don't know what you're doing! Those pets are evil!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Several identical images of Barbra flash through space, one of them towards the camera, and the boys are walking down Main Street

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I'm sure glad that's over with. Now I can sleep at night.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, you guys. We still have time to enter the pumpkin-carving contest.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey, yeah! I almost forgot.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Come on! I bet that together we can make the best pumpkin ever!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You know, evil Cartman? I like you a lot better than our Cartman.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah, you're cool. And you don't say "hella."

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yuh, thanks, you guys. I certainly like you a lot more than in my evil, parallel universe.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Dude, where are we going to find a pumpkin to carve?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Let's use Kenny's squash.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah. You know, I never thought it was such a bad, little squash. It just needs some tender, loving care.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Cartman's house. Cartman is watching TV in the dark. Onscreen, Phillip is in a cemetery standing next to a tombstone that might be Terrance's, and has three roses in his hand

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Boo!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aaaaagh!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aw, man, this movie is hella scary.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Aha! There you are, Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: P'h. Nice costume, you guys. You spent about a buck fifty on those?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: We're here to take you back, Goody Two-Shoes!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh? I've got a better idea. Why don't you two go fuck yourselves?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hey! What's wrong with you, Cartman?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What's wrong with me? Let's see. Uum. I hate you guys. You're hella stupid.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Come on, Mr. Wholesome! We're taking you back to our universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Don't touch me!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What the hell's goin' on?! Cartman never hits us!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hall right! Just stand there, Cartman! This gingerification gun will send you back to our universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, right! You guys are from the evil, parallel universe?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yes!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, it's about freakin' time you showed up! You don't want me, you want that impostor Cartman! Come on, I'll show you.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: The Mayor is dressed as a Puritan woman. Johnson holds a ball on a platter. They are on stage, which is adorned with two spiderwebs and a bat in each one

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: And the winner is: Squash-O-Lantern, by Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski, and the evil Eric Cartman from the parallel universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: We won, dude!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Hooray!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You boys win the Halloween Chocolate Ball!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, no!  Stan and Kyle have come to take my back to my world, and I don't wanna go back!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Don't worry, Evil Cartman. You're staying with us!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Now, zap his hella ass back to your- hella universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stop saying "hella," Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Thought you could get away from us, huh, Cartman?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Please!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Leave him alone, butthole!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Shut your trap, kid!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Why don't you goys take our Cartman back? He's more like you anyway.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Ey, you backstabbin' sellout!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's time, Cartman! Prepare for gingerification!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Well, good-bye, you guys. It's been fun.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: AAAAAH!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: AAAAAH!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, what now?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's the evil pets

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: The gingerification gun!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Get to the stage!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, dear. It really was Stan's fish that killed those people!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Give me that gun, kid!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Up yours, evil twin!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Noooooo!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Noooooo!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: All right, now you can try to send this Bozo through and the whole mess'll be over with!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Sorry Cartman. We like Evil Cartman better. See ya.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: We can't deal with you saying "hella" anymore, Cartman! You're going to the other universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Which one is the good Cartman?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I am!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Stop wasting time, Cartman! We have to send one of you back to the evil universe!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Yeah! Now, which one of you is the Cartman we can't stand?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: He is!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Time is running out. You'll have to destroy us both.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: What?!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: It's the only way you can be sure. We have to both go, for the good of the world.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Noooo! Screw you guys!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: How did you guys know?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Our Cartman would never say anything like that.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Haaa hahaha! You guys are hella stupid! I knew you would fall for that!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh no, dude!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: You tricked us, Cartman!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: That's right, I did!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Damn it!

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: On the street, Randy walks with Officer Barbrady. The evil pets are still attacking the townsfolk.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: I'm sorry my wife held you captive, officer. She's been upset 'cause her Aunt Flo isn't gonna visit her anymore.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Oh, I understand. I remember when my wife stopped getting her monthly visitor.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: Uuuh, do you want your pants back?

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: No. Just leave me with my dignity. Okay, people, move along. Nothing to see here.

title: SPOOKY FISH
text: End of "Spooky Fish." Cartman sings "Best Friends"
